title: Bug 130068 [Regression] Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when previewing a report with parameters.
description:
Description: Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when previewing a report with parameters.
Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When attempting to preview a report with parameters, the Report Parameter window fails to appear.
EB: Click 'Preview' in the Layout menu. Expected result: The Report Parameter window should pop up for user input.
SR:
1. Open a report with parameters.
2. In the Layout menu, click 'Preview'.
3. Observe whether the Report Parameter window appears as expected.
